meanings.definition: A device used for receiving television broadcasts.
meanings.sent1: Our family room has two televisions for watching shows.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching movies on my new television.
meanings.sent3: The televisions in the store seemed to be having a conversation with each other.
meanings.sent4: The televisions in the electronics store were like silent storytellers.
meanings.sent5: The bright screens of the televisions lit up the room like a mini theater.

meanings.definition: The activity of watching television programs.
meanings.sent1: My favorite pastime is relaxing on the couch and watching televisions.
meanings.sent2: She spends hours every day on the sofa, engrossed in television.
meanings.sent3: The televisions at the store were so captivating that I lost track of time.
meanings.sent4: Watching televisions is like entering a different world without leaving your home.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter from the televisions filled the room with joy.
